rules.name: Chase and Replace
rules.instructions: Everybody drinks! If anyone is feeling bold, take a shot and a chaser. Then, choose a rank (other than King and Ace) and change the rule for that card.

rules.name: You
rules.instructions: Pick a person, that person drinks.

rules.name: Me
rules.instructions: Drink. Yeah, you.

rules.name: Floor
rules.instructions: Last person to put a hand on the floor drinks.

rules.name: Guys
rules.instructions: All boys drink.

rules.name: Chicks
rules.instructions: All girls drink.

rules.name: Heaven
rules.instructions: Last person to raise both hands in the air must drink.

rules.name: Pick a Mate
rules.instructions: Pick a person. For the rest of the game, whenever you drink, that person must drink.

rules.name: Bust a Rhyme
rules.instructions: Say a word. Play continues clockwise blah blah blah

rules.name: Categories
rules.instructions: Pick a category. Say a thing belonging to that category. Play continues clockwise blah blah blah blah blah blah blah.

rules.name: I Never
rules.instructions: Everyone raises three (or five) fingers and starts a game of 'Never Have I Ever'.

rules.name: Questions
rules.instructions: klasjd kadsjf ;lakdsjf ;laskdjf ;ladsjf;l aksjdf;lka sdfk;ljasd ;lkjadsf;lk jasdfk;lj lskdjflaskdjf?

rules.name: Make a Rule
rules.instructions: Make a global rule for the current game!

rules.name: Chase and Replace
rules.instructions: Everybody drinks! If anyone is feeling bold, take a shot and a chaser. Then, choose a rank (other than King and Ace) and change the rule for that card.

rules.name: Poo
rules.instructions: Throw poo.

rules.name: Pee
rules.instructions: Throw pee.

rules.name: Score
rules.instructions: And seven years ago.

rules.name: Hive
rules.instructions: Find a beehive and eat it.

rules.name: Dicks
rules.instructions: Eat a bag of dicks.

rules.name: Seven-Eleven
rules.instructions: Leave the game and get more beer.

rules.name: Cate
rules.instructions: Cate must drink.

rules.name: Stein
rules.instructions: Chug 32 oz of beer.

rules.name: Win
rules.instructions: You win! Drink.

rules.name: asdfasdf
rules.instructions: asdf

rules.name: lkjalk
rules.instructions: kla;lj lskdjflaskdjf?

rules.name: Make a Rule
rules.instructions: Make a global rule for the current game!

rules.name: Chase and Replace
rules.instructions: Everybody drinks! If anyone is feeling bold, take a shot and a chaser. Then, choose a rank (other than King and Ace) and change the rule for that card.

rules.name: Artoo
rules.instructions: Do best R2D2 impression, and then continue play clockwise. Vote for the loser who must drink.

rules.name: Me
rules.instructions: Drink. Yeah, you.

rules.name: Floor
rules.instructions: Last person to put a hand on the floor drinks.

rules.name: Guys
rules.instructions: All boys drink.

rules.name: Chicks
rules.instructions: All girls drink.

rules.name: Heaven
rules.instructions: Last person to raise both hands in the air must drink.

rules.name: Pick a Nate
rules.instructions: For the duration of the game, Nate must drink once for every person drinking, times the number of eights drawn.

rules.name: Chewy
rules.instructions: Make the Chewbacca noise, and then drink.

rules.name: Star Wars Categories
rules.instructions: Pick a Star Wars category, such as planets, vehicles, characters, etc. Say a thing belonging to that category. Play continues clockwise. If you get stumped, you must drink.

rules.name: I Never (Star Wars ed.)
rules.instructions: Everyone raises three (or five) fingers and starts a game of 'Never Have I Ever'. All responses must contain a Star-Wars reference.

rules.name: Princesses
rules.instructions: You're in the hot seat for a round of 'Would You Rather'

rules.name: Make a Rule
rules.instructions: Make a global rule for the current game!
